name: The Violence Of Art
description:
"THIS unrest must bear fruit now"

Prepare for the violence of art.As Intel Feridun ,you should feed your art with knowledge and existence.

Made for Mağara Jam 5

Known Bug:

-Press "E" doesn't work properly.You should spam "E",walking in the trigger or exit&enter trigger again.
